body:
Hello Avicus Network. I have here a bug to report.

I am not sure if this is a bug, but I believe this is wrongly added. In the Nebula Server of Apollo, there is this infinity Resistance buff that makes PvP difficult.

Here is a picture showing the Resistance Buff: http://imgur.com/uDQmA19

Is it possible that it can be removed?
Thank you!

Sincerely, 
Skeletonicki013 - Avicus Member since November of 2013
body_tagged:

title: Infinity Resistance Buff in Nebula

replies.body: Bump; someone that is capable of fixing this needs to see this.
replies.body_tagged: Bump; someone that is capable of fixing this needs to see this.

replies.body:
I am capable of fixing it, but basically there was a request on the forum saying that resistance spawn protection would be better than the normal regions so people won't go back into their spawns. Unfortunately.. it heavily broke. I asked Ivy prior to this what to use in YAML as a double-check, however, when I asked for the copy and paste he gave me the wrong one.. so I have no way to really remove this unless I revert which might break some things. In the YAML, the one he gave me was:

loadout:
  effects:
  - damage resistance:5,5
